item.value: @param {Scene} scene - The scene to lightmap.
@param {Entity} root - The root entity of the scene.
destroy temporary directional lights as they are costly to keep around
Create an entity with a render component that is set up to be lightmapped with baked direct lighting
@param {number} primitive.base - The offset of the first index or vertex to dispatch in the draw call.
@description Submits a graphical primitive to the hardware for immediate rendering.
unbind VAO from device to protect it from being changed

@description Marks the end of a block of rendering. This function should be called after a matching call to {@link GraphicsDeviceupdateBegin}. Calls to {@link GraphicsDeviceupdateBegin} and {@link GraphicsDeviceupdateEnd} must not be nested.
clear texture units once a frame on desktop safari

@description Marks the beginning of a block of rendering. Internally, this function binds the render target currently set on the device. This function should be matched with a call to {@link GraphicsDeviceupdateEnd}. Calls to {@link GraphicsDeviceupdateBegin} and {@link GraphicsDeviceupdateEnd} must not be nested.
@description Marks the beginning of a block of rendering. Internally, this function
@description Copies source render target into destination render target. Mostly used by post-effects.
@description Set the active scissor rectangle on the specified device.
@param {number} x - The pixel space x-coordinate of the bottom left corner of the viewport.
@param {number} y - The pixel space y-coordinate of the bottom left corner of the viewport.
@description Set the active rectangle for rendering on the specified device.
make sure colorWrite is set to true to all channels, if you want to fully clear the target
@description Sets the specified render target on the device. If null is passed as a parameter, the back buffer becomes the current target for all rendering operations.
optionally clip borders when rendering
force change shader if the object uses a different variant of the same material
prevMaterial = null; force change shader if the object uses a different variant of the same material
apply visibility override
Unset meshInstance overrides back to material values if next draw call will use the same material
Revert temp frame stuff
render shadows for all local visible lights - these shadow maps are shared by all cameras
@description The shadow map is regenerated this frame and not on subsequent frames.
@description The shadow map is regenerated every frame.
Sort shadow casters
set basic material statesparameters
num Shadow Modes
directional shadows are per camera, so get appropriate render data
fix accessing non-existing shadow mapcamera when the light was createdapplied, but shadowmap was never initialized
heart texture's alpha channel as a cookie texture
update Clusters
visibility culling of lights, meshInstances, shadows casters after this the scene culling is done and script callbacks can be called to report which objects are visible

Generate static lighting for meshes in this layer if needed
update the skybox, since this might change _meshInstances
The 8 points of the camera frustum transformed to light space
used for stereo
returns number of extra draw calls to skip - used to skip auto instanced meshes draw calls. by default return 0 to not skip any additional draw calls
